description: The creamy freshness of avocado elevates this basic potato salad.
keywords: Potato salad,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Avocado,Sesame free,Dairy free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Avocado Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium avocado, peeled, de-seeded and sliced
1 small red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. In a baking tray, cover the potatoes with the oil and seasoning and bake for 20 minutes.
Heat up a pot of boiling water and boil the eggs for 7 minutes.
When everything is cooked, remove from the heat and allow to cool.
Slice your eggs and avocado and then combine with the rest of the ingredients before serving.
